mapper.select: SELECT g.group_id, g.title, g.description, g.creator_id, g.created_at, g.max_participants, g.attraction_id, u.user_id AS creator_id, u.nickname AS creator_name, u.email AS creator_email, u.avatar_url AS creator_url, a.attraction_id AS attraction_id, a.address AS attraction_address, a.content_id AS attraction_content_id, a.first_image AS attraction_first_image, a.map_x AS attraction_map_x, a.map_y AS attraction_map_y, a.tel AS attraction_tel, a.title AS attraction_title, a.sigungu_name AS attraction_sigungu_name FROM `groups` g INNER JOIN `user` u ON g.creator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN `attractions` a ON g.attraction_id = a.attraction_id WHERE g.group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT g.group_id, g.title, g.description, g.creator_id, g.created_at, g.max_participants, g.attraction_id, u.user_id AS creator_id, u.nickname AS creator_name, u.email AS creator_email, u.avatar_url AS creator_url, a.attraction_id AS attraction_id, a.address AS attraction_address, a.content_id AS attraction_content_id, a.first_image AS attraction_first_image, a.map_x AS attraction_map_x, a.map_y AS attraction_map_y, a.tel AS attraction_tel, a.title AS attraction_title, a.sigungu_name AS attraction_sigungu_name FROM `groups` g INNER JOIN `user` u ON g.creator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN `attractions` a ON g.attraction_id = a.attraction_id
